fields.headline: What's new?
fields.bodyText: Out of Arabia British Airways (0870 850 9850) is to suspend its flights between Heathrow and Jeddah and Riyadh in Saudi Arabia from 27 March due to reduced passenger demand for flights. Single minded Single travellers from all over the world can find like-minded companions to holiday with on a new website - www.companions2travel.co.uk. Annual membership is £25. Trial membership is free. Security locks Suitcase locks that can be opened by US baggage security without having to break them are available from Travel With Care (0870 748 9562). Caravan of love If Minnie Driver has persuaded you that caravanning is cool, visit the Caravan and Motorhome Show (0870 128 8288) at Manchester's G-Mex, from Thursday to Sunday, adults £6.50. Seychelles flights Emirates (0870 243 2222) has launched new flights from the UK to the Seychelles to run three times a week, via Dubai, for £714, plus tax, until 21 March.
